I couldn't figure out why, but Inori had been\nacting rather suspicious lately.%K%P
I ran into Inori in the corridor.%K%P
'G-Good morning.'%K%P
'G-Good, good mor...morning!'%K%P
Inori fumbled her words as she\nbowed her head very low.%K%P
'W-Well! Excuse me!'%K%P
'Oh.'%K%P
I reached out my arm towards Inori's back as she\nwalked away. But she was out of reach.%K%P
I let out a sigh and scratched my head\nwith that same hand.%K%P
It's been a few days since Inori and I started\noffering regional contribution.%K%P
Because of it, I've been spending more time\nwith Inori ever since we started living\ntogether at Tsubaki Apartments.%K%P
We'd already accomplished a number of\nrequests together.%K%P
But...%K%P
'Something's not right.'%K%P
Inori was acting a little strange.%K%P
More specifically, she wouldn't look at me in\nthe eye and she was avoiding converstaion\nwith me.%K%P
I can't even remember the last time we spoke.%K%P
Lately she'd leave the very moment she'd\nrun into me.%K%P
'Meh, who am I to judge?'%K%P
I mean, I felt somewhat awkward myself.%K%P
Ever since the cat search inquiry, I've been catching\nmyself following her with my eyes.%K%P
When I looked at Inori, my heart ached with a strong\ndesire to talk and be with her.%K%P
That's why it hurt when she avoided me.%K%P
'Oh man, what do I do?'%K%P
I didn't know why she was avoiding me and\nthere was nothing I could do about it.%K%P
I needed to figure out why so I could talk\nto her again.%K%P
'We can't go on like this.'%K%P
In order to blow away the heartache,\nI had to reset my mind.%K%P
'*Sigh* What is going on with me?'%K%P
After Sho was out of sight, she leaned on\nthe corner of the corridor\nand dropped her shoulders.%K%P
'I don't mean to avoid him...'%K%P
In truth, I really wanted to talk to him.%K%P
I wanted to be by his side and spend more\ntime with him.%K%P
'But, I'm too embarrassed...'%K%P
Since when did I start thinking about him so much?%K%P
It was obvious...%K%P
'I admired how he acted that time...'%K%P
It'd been a few days, but I still blushed whenever\nI remembered that moment.%K%P
Those big arms that held me close, his handsome face,\nand his kind words.%K%P
My heart beat at his ever so manly ways.%K%P
'He put his face closer to mine\nthat time to...'%K%P
Could it be because he was about to kiss me?%K%P
'Sho and I kissing...'%K%P
Just that thought made me burn with shame,\nbut a part of me really wanted it to happen.%K%P
'This feeling, could this be...love?'%K%P
I didn't know.%K%P
I was a goddess who watched over Kannagi.%K%P
It's not like I wasn't longing for love,\nI just never expected to encounter it while\non duty as a goddess.%K%P
But right now, I had strong feelings for one man.%K%P
'Sho...'%K%P
Just calling his name made me fraught\nwith emotion.%K%P
At the same time, I felt terribly empty without\nhis warmth by my side.%K%P
If this was love, would this feeling calm down\nif I confessed?%K%P
But, what if he doesn't accept my feelings...%K%P
'*Sigh* Hmmm...'%K%P
The thought kept popping back up in my head.%K%P
The aching of my heart and Inori's behavior became\nmore serious as days passed by.%K%P
I tried to talk to her, but she kept avoiding me.%K%P
Forget conversation, there was nothing I could do\nif she kept avoiding me like that.%K%P
Did she actually hate me?\nThe thought left me greatly depressed.%K%P
'*Sigh*'%K%P
I still couldn't stop thinking about Inori.%K%P
Her embarrassed, angry, sad, and happy faces...\nThey were all burned into my mind and\nI couldn't get them out.%K%P
'Inori...'%K%P
It'd only been a few days and the sight of her smile\nalready felt like a distant memory.%K%P
'I want to see her smile like that again.'%K%P
My thoughts only got more intense.%K%P
I've never felt this strongly about a person before.%K%P
What was happening to me?%K%P
'*Sigh*'%K%P
Unable to express my feelings, I headed\nto the living room as I sighed, who knows\nhow many times.%K%P
'Ah... How did it end up like this?'%K%P
I froze when I opened the living room door\na little and heard Inori's voice.%K%P
'I...really.'%K%P
I couldn't make out what she said from\nbehind the door.%K%P
'Sho...'%K%P
Hearing my name startled me.%K%P
'I know that we can't go on like this,\nbut... *Sigh*'%K%P
'Should I tell Sho that I--?'%K%P
It was apparent that she had something\nto tell me.%K%P
When I leaned against the door to hear better,\nit made a loud creak.%K%P
'Huh?! Wh-Who's there?!'%K%P
I decided to enter the living room since I knew\nI couldn't hide any longer after surprising her.%K%P
'Sh-Sho?!'%K%P
When I entered the room, Inori's eyes\nwidened in surprise.%K%P
She then started to panic, her face\nchanging color.%K%P
'Wh-Wh-Wh-Why are you here?!\nD-Did you hear what I just said?'%K%P
'Nope, I knew you were saying something, but\nI didn't catch the details.'%K%P
'O-Okay, good.'%K%P
'Um, Inori...\nAre you free right now?'%K%P
'What, oh, um... S-Sorry!\nI've got private matters to attend to.\nS-So if you-- Ahh!'%K%P
'Inori!'%K%P
I caught her in my arms after she stood up too fast\nto avoid me and almost fell to the floor.%K%P
'Whoa, are you okay?'%K%P
'Oh, uh... I-I'm okay.'%K%P
'Glad to hear...'%K%P
As I held her in my arms, Inori looked so beautiful,\nespecially after not seeing her in a while.%K%P
I was captivated by her glistening eyes, the heat\nfrom her breath, and her lustrous hair.%K%P
'Hey, Inori. Could I have a moment to talk to you?'%K%P
'U-Uh... Sho, you held me, in your arms,\nin your arms... And, and... Umm...'%K%P
'Did I do something?\nIf I did, I'd like to apologize.'%K%P
'N-No. It's not your fault, Sho!'%K%P
It was painful to see her in such distress.%K%P
'Then, what's going on?\nIt's pains me to\nnot be able to talk to you.'%K%P
'Inori, I want to...'%K%P
'A-Augh... I-I'm sorry!'%K%P
'Ah!'%K%P
Inori jumped out of my arms and ran out\nof the living room.%K%P
'I just saw Inori rush out of here...\nHey, something seems weird.\nWhat'd you do?'%K%P
Maika tilted her head in curiosity after she stepped\ninto the living room.%K%P
I continued to stare out the door where Inori ran\nout and didn't even respond to Maika.%K%P
Maika came in and sat down with me on the\nveranda.%K%P
'Here's some tea.'%K%P
'Thanks.'%K%P
I finished the tea Maika served me and took a rest.%K%P
'So, what happened?'%K%P
'Actually...'%K%P
From the earlier mishap, I'd learned that\nI couldn't figure this out by myself,\nso I spilled it all to Maika.%K%P
'Hmm, I see. She was totally unapproachable, huh?'%K%P
'Yup. If she keeps avoiding me like this, I'll never\nfind out what's going on.'%K%P
At least, there was no question that she\nwas avoiding me.%K%P
'It's true.\nInori's been acting weird lately.'%K%P
Maika stopped talking and after a moment of\ncontemplation, she looked straight at me.%K%P
'Sho, you like Inori, don't you?'%K%P
'What? Where did that come from? Of course\nI like her, I definitely don't dislike her...'%K%P
'Don't play dumb.\nI'm asking if you like her\nas more than a friend...'%K%P
'More than a friend?\nNo, what are you saying?!'%K%P
'Anyone could tell that you like Inori from\nthe way you act, Sho.'%K%P
'It's that obvious...?'%K%P
'Completely unaware, huh?\nYou've been thinking about her\nall the time lately.'%K%P
'I'm sick of seeing you guys not go anywhere\nwhen it's obvious that you both\nhave feelings for each other.'%K%P
'Does that mean...'%K%P
If I heard right, Maika just implied that Inori\nalso liked me as more than as a friend.%K%P
I stared intently and Maika giggled.%K%P
'Sho, I just want you to be honest with yourself.'%K%P
'The stupidly honest, gentle, and softhearted\nchildhood friend is the Sho Narumi I know.'%K%P
'Are you lying to yourself?\nOr am I the one blowing it\nout of proportion?'%K%P
As Maika looked at me intently,\nI contemplated her words.%K%P
I thought about what Maika said to me.%K%P
If I were my usual self, I'd ask for help\nto settle things quickly rather than trying\nto handle it alone.%K%P
But, I didn't do that.%K%P
Why was that?%K%P
Actually, it was obvious.%K%P
When it was about Inori, I didn't want\nanyone else to be involved.%K%P
I wanted Inori to be happy, I wanted to protect\nher kind heart and I didn't want to think\nthat she hated me.%K%P
'I seeee...\nMaika you're exactly right.'%K%P
Maika's words touched my heart.%K%P
'Am I being nosy?'%K%P
'Nope, I'm good now. Thanks Maika!\nWithout you I wouldn't\nbe aware of my own feelings.'%K%P
'All right, then. Now you know what to do, right?'%K%P
'Yup, of course.'%K%P
My heart was free of all doubts.%K%P
Now it was time for me to take action.%K%P
Now that Maika helped me realize my feelings,\nI searched for Inori but couldn't find her.%K%P
'Did she go out?'%K%P
'Hey Sho? What's up?'%K%P
When I stepped out, I bumped into\nAkane who just came back home.%K%P
'Hey Akane.'%K%P
'Sho, I'm back! Get this!\nToday at the shopping street...'%K%P
'Sorry, I'm in a bit of a hurry.'%K%P
As soon as I said that, Akane became\nnoticeably pouty.%K%P
'Arg, you're busy too?\nInori was also.'%K%P
'You saw Inori?'ã€€%K%P
'Oh, yup. I saw her. So what?'%K%P
'I was looking for her.\nDo you mind telling me\nwhere you saw her?'%K%P
'Uh, I think it was at the crossroads\nnear the park.'%K%P
'Near the park... Okay.'%K%P
That meant she was headed to that one place.%K%P
'Thanks Akane.'%K%P
'Sure? Not sure what's going on, but maybe\nyou can help her. She seemed to be\nthinking hard about something.'%K%P
'Yeah.'%K%P
With Akane's words of encouragement, I ran off.%K%P
'*Huff, huff* Phew...'%K%P
I ran so fast that my chest started to hurt.%K%P
I just pressed on and kept going.%K%P
Inori had to be there, I just knew it.%K%P
I ran because I wanted to see her.%K%P
'Finally...here.'%K%P
I forced myself to catch my breath and entered\nthe shrine I had visited with Inori before.%K%P
While located in the middle of a residential area,\nthe shrine gave off a sacred atmosphere\nand there she was.%K%P
'Inori.'%K%P
'Oh, Sh-Sho...'%K%P
Inori didn't try to escape when I\nentered the grounds.%K%P
She smiled, then turned away awkwardly.%K%P
'Why are you here?'%K%P
'I searched for you because I wanted\nto tell you something.'%K%P
'R-Really?'%K%P
A brief period of silence followed.%K%P
'U-Um!'%K%P
Our voices overlapped.%K%P
Now that we had each other's attention,\nwe both let out a strained laugh.%K%P
'Then, may I go first?'%K%P
'Sure.'%K%P
After she took a deep breath, she straightened\nherself out.%K%P
'I've been avoiding you a lot.'%K%P
'First, I want to apologize for that.\nI'm really sorry.'%K%P
She then deeply bowed her head.%K%P
'So, yes, I've been acting weird.'%K%P
'Whenever I thought about you, I got confused.\nI couldn't even look at you. Even now I'm trying\nso hard to keep my voice from shaking.'%K%P
'I'm always thinking about you. I follow you with\nmy eyes whenever I get a chance.'%K%P
'My heart won't stop skipping.\nI end up running away\nwhen I don't mean to.'%K%P
'But, that all ends today.'%K%P
Inori looked up.%K%P
This time, she didn't look away from me.%K%P
'Sho, I like you more than a friend.\nI love you.'%K%P
Inori continued to look straight at me.%K%P
That's why, I also confessed.%K%P
'Me too.'%K%P
'What?'%K%P
'It's the same for me.\nI'd find myself following you with my eyes\nwhenever I got a chance.'%K%P
'I'm so nervous that standing in front of you\nlike this is making my legs shake.'%K%P
'I didn't know what this feeling was at first.\nBut I'm sure of it now.'%K%P
'I want you by my side, I want to be with you\nall the time. I...I love you too, Inori.'%K%P
I firmly confessed my own feelings back to her.%K%P
'So...we love each other, mutually?'%K%P
'That's right.'%K%P
'I'm happy...'%K%P
Tears fell from Inori's eyes.%K%P
'I-I thought since I've been avoiding you,\nyou hated me now.'%K%P
As she started to cry, I hugged her to comfort her.%K%P
'I wouldn't hate you because of that.\nPlus, you're not gonna be\nrunning away anymore, right?'%K%P
'O-Of course not.'%K%P
'Then, everything's fine.\nWe won't bring that up again.'%K%P
'Anyway, Inori, this means that\nyou're my girlfriend, right?'%K%P
'Y-Yes. I am your g-girlfriend.'%K%P
As I called her name, she became fidgety\nwhile her face turned red.%K%P
I couldn't help myself.%K%P
'Inori...'%K%P
'Y-Yes?'%K%P
'Can we do something only lovers do?'%K%P
'What?! Oh, um, I'm not sure how good--\nAh, mm, muah.'%K%P
Before Inori could finish her sentence,\nI stole a kiss from her small lips.%K%P
Her body was stiff with nervousness, but she\nrelaxed soon after.%K%P
'Looking forward to spending more time with you.'%K%P
'Y-Yes. I feel the same.'%K%P
Seeing Inori swoon in my arms excited me.\nI was so happy to I'd get to be around\nher cuteness more often.%K%P
